voice_samples.description: Simple expense with stationary items, UPI payment
voice_samples.text: Kal main market gaya tha... stationary kharidne ke liye. Teen packet A4 size ka paper liya, price tha Rs 250 per packet. Aur ek stapler machine bhi li Rs 180 mein. Total hua Rs 930. Payment UPI se kiya.

voice_samples.description: Sale invoice with cement bags, transportation, mixed payment
voice_samples.text: Aaj Ramesh Traders ko invoice banana hai. Unhone 50 bags cement order kiya tha, rate Rs 420 per bag hai. Total cement ka Rs 21,000 hota hai. Plus transportation charges Rs 800 add karna hai. Grand total Rs 21,800. Half payment cash mila Rs 10,000, baaki credit mein.

voice_samples.description: Partial payment to supplier with bill number, split payment
voice_samples.text: I need to record a payment. Today I paid my supplier Mohit Electronics. Bill number ME-145... the total amount was Rs 45,500. I paid Rs 25,000 by bank transfer and remaining Rs 20,500 will be paid next week.

voice_samples.description: Multiple office expenses including printer cartridge, cleaning supplies, electricity bill
voice_samples.text: Office ke liye kuch purchase kiya aaj. Pehle ek printer cartridge liya Rs 2,800 ka... wo HP wala black cartridge. Fir cleaning supplies bhi le aaye... phenyl Rs 150, wiper Rs 80, detergent powder Rs 250. Aur electricity bill bhi pay kiya Rs 4,200. Sab kuch credit card se payment hua. Total expense Rs 7,480 banta hai.

voice_samples.description: Sale with electrical items - bulbs, switchboards, wire rolls
voice_samples.text: Sharma ji ko bill banana hai. Unhone teen item kharida... pehla LED bulb 20 pieces, Rs 85 per piece. Doosra switchboard 10 pieces, Rs 120 each. Teesra wire roll 5 pieces, Rs 450 per roll. Pura amount cash payment mila Rs 6,200.

voice_samples.description: Payment received from customer via NEFT with invoice reference
voice_samples.text: Payment received hai aaj. Customer Vijay Kumar ne apna pending payment bheja. Invoice number VK-89 ka payment tha Rs 38,000. Unhone NEFT se transfer kiya. Bank statement mein check kar liya, amount credit ho gaya.

voice_samples.description: Multiple expenses - internet bill, staff lunch, stationery, petrol
voice_samples.text: I want to add today's expenses. First, I paid the internet bill of Rs 1,200 through online banking. Then I bought lunch for the office staff, that was Rs 850 in cash. Also purchased some printing paper and envelopes from the stationery shop, total Rs 680. And petrol for the delivery vehicle, Rs 2,500 at the pump. Everything adds up to Rs 5,230.

voice_samples.description: Delivery challan with tiles, truck number, delivery address
voice_samples.text: Delivery challan banana hai. Aaj Kumar Enterprises ko goods bheje. Item hai 100 boxes tiles, 2 feet by 2 feet size. Rate mention nahi karna kyunki challan hai. Truck number DL-8C-5678 se bheja. Unka godown address hai Sector 12, Rohini. Delivery date aaj hai 24th December.

voice_samples.description: Sale order with plastic chairs, advance payment, delivery date
voice_samples.text: Sale order lena hai. Gupta Traders ne order diya hai... 200 pieces plastic chair chahiye unko. Rate final hua Rs 320 per chair. Total amount Rs 64,000. Delivery date 5th January tak dena hai. Advance payment Rs 20,000 mila hai GPay se. Baaki amount delivery ke time lenge.

voice_samples.description: Multiple payments - rent, labour wages, salaries, utility bills
voice_samples.text: Multiple payments karne hain aaj. Pehla payment rent ka... Rs 35,000 landlord ko dena hai, wo cheque se diya number 456789. Second payment labour wages ka Rs 12,000, wo cash mein diya supervisor ko. Third staff salaries partial payment hai Rs 48,000, wo account transfer se kiya. Aur last electricity aur water bill combined Rs 5,600 online pay kiya. Total outgoing Rs 1,00,600 hai aaj.

voice_samples.description: Invoice with grocery items - rice, oil, delivery charges, credit payment
voice_samples.text: Invoice banao ek. Customer naam hai Modern Traders. Items... 25 kg basmati rice Rs 125 per kg total Rs 3,125. Fir 10 litre refined oil Rs 180 per litre Rs 1,800. Plus delivery charges Rs 100. Total billing Rs 5,025. Payment method credit, 15 days ki credit period hai.

voice_samples.description: Full day expenses - vehicle servicing, office supplies, meeting, petrol
voice_samples.text: Aaj ka kharcha likhna hai. Subah vehicle servicing karwai Rs 3,500. Dopahar mein office supplies liye... printer paper 5 packet Rs 1,250, pen aur marker Rs 450, file folders Rs 300. Sham ko client meeting ke liye chai nashta Rs 680. Raat ko petrol bharwaya Rs 1,500. Sab milake Rs 7,680 expense hua. Payment mixed tha... Rs 5,000 card se baaki cash.

voice_samples.description: Payment received against three invoices via RTGS with reference number
voice_samples.text: Recording incoming payment. Received Rs 52,000 from Apex Solutions today. This was against three pending invoices... invoice 101 for Rs 18,000, invoice 107 for Rs 22,000, and invoice 112 for Rs 12,000. They paid by RTGS. Transaction reference number is APS8756TXN.

voice_samples.description: Large construction order with cement, sand, gravel, transport, advance, delivery schedule, TDS
voice_samples.text: Bada order aaya hai... ABC Construction Company ka. Unko chahiye 500 bags cement grade 53, rate Rs 385 per bag, cement ka total Rs 1,92,500. Phir 200 bags sand, Rs 55 per bag, total Rs 11,000. Aur 100 bags gravel bhi, Rs 65 per bag Rs 6,500. Transport charges separately Rs 5,000. Grand total Rs 2,15,000 ban raha hai. Advance unhone diya Rs 50,000 NEFT se. Delivery schedule hai do installment mein... 15th January tak 300 bags cement, baaki 30th January. TDS katna padega 2% ka.

voice_samples.description: Delivery challan with door hardware items, vehicle details, destination
voice_samples.text: Creating delivery challan for Metro Hardware Store. Dispatching 150 pieces door handles model DH-205, 80 pieces door locks model SF-330, and 50 pieces tower bolts model TB-110. No rates to be mentioned. Delivery through our own vehicle number UP-14-AB-9876. Destination is their warehouse at Industrial Area Phase 2. Expected delivery time is tomorrow morning by 10 AM.
